If you do not accept these Terms, you should refrain from accessing the Service and using the Bazigaar app.

listItems.option: Age requirement: You must be of legal age to participate in lotteries in your jurisdiction. In most places, this means you must be at least 18 years old. You should not use the lottery app if you are not of legal age.

Accurate information: When you register on the Bazigaar app, you must provide accurate and complete information about yourself. This includes your name, date of birth, and contact information. You should update your information if it changes.
Secure account: You are responsible for keeping our app account secure. This means choosing a strong password and not sharing it with anyone. You should also enable two-factor authentication.
Compliance with terms: You must comply with the terms and conditions of the Bazigaar app. This includes any rules related to purchasing tickets, claiming prizes, and using the app.

Responsible gambling: Lottery gambling can be addictive and can have serious financial consequences. You should only spend what you can afford and never gamble with money you need for other important expenses. If you feel like you may have a gambling problem, seek help from a professional.
Paying taxes: If you win a prize, you may be required to pay taxes on it. You should consult with a tax professional to understand your obligations.
Appropriate conduct: You should use the Bazigaar app responsibly and refrain from any inappropriate conduct, such as using the app to cheat or harass other users.

termsAndConditions.title: Selection of winners
termsAndConditions.description: How we determine the winners is described below:

listItems.option: We create a list of all eligible participants who have entered the lottery.
We use a computer program(Random number generator) to determine 1st,2nd and 3rd winners from the list of entries. We ensure that the selection process is truly random and unbiased.
Document the selection process and keep a record of the winning entries and their corresponding prizes.
Announce the winners and notify them of their prizes. We ensure that the selection process is transparent and that it can be verified by an independent party if necessary.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.description: Bazigaar is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and share your personal information when you use our mobile application.

privacyPolicy.title: Information we collect
privacyPolicy.description: We collect the information you provide to us directly, such as when you create an account, complete a form, or contact us for support. This may include your name, email address, phone number, and any other information you choose to provide. We may also collect information about your use of the app, including information about the device you use to access the app, your IP address, your browsing history within the app, and other useful information. We may also receive information about you from third-party sources, such as social media platforms or other users of the app.

privacyPolicy.title: How we use your information
privacyPolicy.description: We may use the information we collect for various purposes, including:

listItems.option: To provide and improve our services: We may use your information to operate and improve our mobile app, and to provide you with a better user experience.
To personalize your experience: We may use your information to personalize your experience with the app, such as by showing you content that is tailored to your interests.
To communicate with you: We may use your information to send you updates, notifications, and other communications related to the app.
To comply with legal obligations: We may use your information to comply with applicable laws and regulations, such as responding to a legal process or government request.

privacyPolicy.title: How we share your information
privacyPolicy.description: We may share your information with third-party service providers who perform services on our behalf, such as hosting, data analysis, and customer service. We may also share your information with our affiliates, such as our parent company or subsidiaries. We may also share your information with other users of the app, such as when you choose to share content or interact with other users. We may disclose your information when we believe it is necessary to comply with applicable laws or regulations, to respond to a legal process or government request, or to protect our rights or the rights of others.

privacyPolicy.title: Your rights
privacyPolicy.description: You can instruct us to provide you with any data we hold about you at any time. We require these documents to protect the identities of our users and to ensure personal information is only disclosed to the person who has the right to receive it. Such requests will be fulfilled subject to the following conditions:

listItems.option: The payment of an administration fee

The supply of appropriate evidence of your identity. This includes a notarised copy of your passport and an original copy of a utility bill showing your name and address. We reserve the right to request additional proof of your identity if necessary

privacyPolicy.title: Security of your information
privacyPolicy.description: We take reasonable measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, use, and disclosure. Our methods of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is completely secure, and we guarantee the security of your information.

privacyPolicy.title: Your choices
privacyPolicy.description: You can always choose not to provide us with certain information, but this may limit your ability to use certain features of the app. You can also opt out of receiving promotional communications from us by following the instructions in the communication.

privacyPolicy.title: Changes to this Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.description: This privacy policy may be updated without notice. New versions of the policy will be published on our website or within the app and we advise that you revisit this page to keep up with any changes. We may on occasion notify you of any changes to this privacy policy via email.

privacyPolicy.title: Contact us
privacyPolicy.description: If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our privacy practices, please contact us at support@bazigaar.com.
